text:
Jenna Marie Ortega (born September 27, 2002) is an American actress. She is noted for her roles on television as young Jane in "Jane the Virgin", Harley Diaz in "Stuck in the Middle" and Ellie Alves in "You". In 2016, she began voicing Princess Isabel in the Disney Channel animated series "Elena of Avalor". Ortega's movie work includes starring as Annie in ' (2013), Mary Ann in "The Little Rascals Save the Day" (2014) and Dawn in "Saving Flora" (2018).
Ortega was born in Coachella Valley, California. She is of Mexican and Puerto Rican ancestry.

annotations.surface_form: The Little Rascals Save the Day
